<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Starfall Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1861)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 23,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Heavy Rondache](/Shields.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [high-grade adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=310) [heavy rondache](/Shields.aspx?ID=10) (Hardness 17, HP  100, BT 50) bears a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41)_ and has dents that resemble craters on its surface. While wielding the shield, you have fire resistance 15.

<document level="2" id="action-1559" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Starfall Shield
